scripts.install: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.test: npm test --prefix backend && npm test --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend && npm run lint:fix --prefix backend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix frontend && npm run format:check --prefix backend
scripts.portfolio:demo: echo 'Starting MaBar Portfolio Demo...' && npm run build:prod && concurrently "npm run start:prod" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
